title: Three weeks in Britain
creator_credit: Ronald Spencer and Littleton Park Productions
brief_description: A journey through Britain including Wales; the Isle of Mann where the tranquility is broken only by the annual excitement of th Manx Grand Prix; pony trekking through County Down in Northern Ireland; fishing in the highland streams of Scotland and a visit to the historic capital of Edinburgh; and culminating in a grand tour of London.
